description: SpaceIQ Booking Configuration - Set your preferences here

booking_days.note: Default is [2, 3] for Wednesday and Thursday. Change to [0, 1, 2, 3, 4] to book all weekdays.

wait_times.description: How long to wait between booking rounds (in seconds)

rounds_1_to_5.note: 1 minute - aggressive checking for early rounds

rounds_6_to_15.note: 5 minutes - moderate checking for middle rounds

rounds_16_plus.note: 15 minutes - conservative checking for later rounds

wait_times.explanation: The bot progressively waits longer between rounds. Early rounds check every minute, then slows to 5 min, then 15 min.

priority_ranges.reason: All desks in 2.24 area - customize your priorities here

notes.dates_to_try: List of dates to book. Bot tries each once. If no seats, skips to next.
notes.booked_dates: Successfully booked dates are automatically moved here.
notes.desk_prefix: Only click desks whose ID starts with this prefix
